sentences.text: During the same period, President of Albania|President Ilir Meta faced widespread allegations of violating the constitution, particularly in his intervention in the electoral process and the overt partisan stance against the PS he adopted during the 2021 elections. In June 2021, the parliament initiated impeachment proceedings against Meta, accusing him of undermining the neutrality of the presidency. However, in February 2022, the Constitutional Court of Albania|constitutional court ruled that Meta's actions did not constitute a violation of the constitution.

references.text: <ref>{{cite web |publisher=Deutsche Welle (DW) |title=Albania parliament impeaches President Meta |url=https://www.dw.com/en/albania-parliament-impeaches-president-ilir-meta-removes-him-from-office/a-57830015 |access-date=15 November 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20210609145317/https://www.dw.com/en/albania-parliament-impeaches-president-ilir-meta-removes-him-from-office/a-57830015 |archive-date=9 June 2021 |date=9 June 2021}}</ref>

sentences.text:
The electoral system of Albania is constructed upon the principles defined in the Constitution of Albania|constitution and the electoral code. As a parliamentary republic, Albania implements a regional proportional representation method that allocates seats in the Parliament of Albania|parliament according to the proportion of votes garnered by political parties in a multi-party system.{{sfn|OSCE|1998|p=1|loc=Article 1}}{{sfn|OSCE|1998|p=12|loc=Article 64}}{{sfn|OSCE|2021|p=6}} The parliament is composed of 140 representatives with a term of four years.{{sfn|OSCE|1998|p=12|loc=Article 64}} The constitution codifies substantial democratic principles, stipulating that voting rights are equal, free, and conducted through secret ballot.{{sfn|OSCE|1998|p=9|loc=Article 45}}{{sfn|OSCE|1998|p=14|loc=Article 73}} All citizens of Albania, upon reaching the age of 18 and have not been deprived of voting rights, are permitted to participate in elections.{{sfn|OSCE|1998|p=8|loc=Article 45}} The electoral code also establishes comprehensive procedures for voter registration, ensuring that all eligible citizens can participate fully in the process. The allocation of representatives in the parliament is integrated on population size within 12 electoral districts, which correspond to the Counties of Albania|administrative regions of Albania.{{sfn|OSCE|2021|p=6}} To ensure proportional representation, the d'Hondt method is employed for seat distribution to parties, contingent upon an electoral threshold of 1%.{{sfn|OSCE|2021|p=6}} Nationally, each party is required to run 46 candidates in the closed lists and 140 candidates in the open lists. For example, if a party wins 15 seats in Tirana, the candidates elected in the Parliament would be the 12 candidates from the closed lists and the 3 most voted candidates from the open lists.

sentences.text: According to the constitution, parliamentary elections in Albania are required to be conducted no later than 60 days and no earlier than 30 days prior to the expiration of the parliament's mandate.{{sfn|OSCE|1998|p=12|loc=Article 64}} On 11 October 2024, the commissioner Ilirjan Celibashi of the {{lang|sq|Central Election Commission (Albania)|Komisioni Qendror i Zgjedhjeve|i=no}} (KQZ) recommended the period between 20 April and 11 May 2025, as the most appropriate timeframe for the upcoming parliamentary elections. On 11 November 2024, President of Albania|President Bajram Begaj procedurally initiated consultations to determine the election date for the elections, inviting representatives from the Coalition for Reforms, Integration, and Consolidated Institutions (KRIIK) to the {{lang|sq|Presidential Office Building, Tirana|Presidenca|i=no}}. Following on 19 November, Begaj held the first round of consultations with leaders of smaller opposition parties, who proposed 4 May as the most suitable election date. This suggestion was made in light of the anticipated European Political Community Summit in Tirana on 9 May, with leaders arguing that holding elections before the summit would prevent potential electoral manipulation. The Democratic Party declined to participate in consultations with President Begaj. The Freedom Party accepted the invitation, with Tedi Blushi and Erisa Xhixho requesting that the President decree any election date permitted by the Electoral Code, except the one proposed by Taulant Balla of the Socialist Party. Conclusively, on 5 December, Begaj announced that the 2025 elections would be scheduled for 11 May 2025.

references.text: <ref>{{cite web |work=Zëri |title=Datat për zgjedhjet 2025/ Celibashi, letër partive: S'kemi kohë për votim elektronik, e bëjmë vetëm në Elbasan e Durrës! |url=https://zeri.ai/politike-zbulohen-datat-per-zgjedhjet-2025-celibashi-leter-partive-per-votimin-elektronik-nuk-kemi-kohe-mund-te-realizoh-i213087 |access-date=15 November 2024 |archive-url=https://archive.today/20241115111701/https://zeri.ai/politike-zbulohen-datat-per-zgjedhjet-2025-celibashi-leter-partive-per-votimin-elektronik-nuk-kemi-kohe-mund-te-realizoh-i213087 |archive-date=15 November 2024 |location=Tirana |language=sq |date=11 October 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref>{{cite web |publisher=ABC News (Albania)|ABC News |title=Presidenti Begaj takim me përfaqësues të Kriik: Shoqëria civile të angazhohet në mbikëqyrjen e zgjedhjeve |url=https://abcnews.al/presidenti-begaj-takim-me-perfaqesues-te-kriik-shoqeria-civile-te-angazhohet-ne-mbikeqyrjen-e-zgjedhjeve/ |access-date=15 November 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20241112044419/https://abcnews.al/presidenti-begaj-takim-me-perfaqesues-te-kriik-shoqeria-civile-te-angazhohet-ne-mbikeqyrjen-e-zgjedhjeve/ |archive-date=12 November 2024 |language=sq |date=11 November 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref name="SHQ20November">{{cite web |work=Shqiptarja |title=Data e zgjedhjeve 2025/ Presidenti nis takimet me partitë! 'Të vegjlit' propozojnë 4 majin! Begaj: Hapi i parë i një procesi që duhet të jetë model |url=https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/begaj-nis-konsultimet-per-daten-e-zgjedhjeve-2025-pres-sot-pr-pbdnj-pdiu-e-lzhk |access-date=29 November 2024 |archive-url=https://archive.today/20241129113543/https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/begaj-nis-konsultimet-per-daten-e-zgjedhjeve-2025-pres-sot-pr-pbdnj-pdiu-e-lzhk |archive-date=29 November 2024 |location=Tirana |language=sq |date=20 November 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref name="SHQ20November"/> Begaj described the consultations as the beginning of a transparent and constructive electoral process.<ref name="SHQ20November"/> He emphasised that the decision regarding the election date should be based on the best interests of voters, following a balanced, open debate with input from a wide range of political and institutional actors.<ref>{{cite web |publisher=Euronews Albania |title=Data e zgjedhjeve, Begaj: Proces konsultash dhe llogaridhënie për aktorët politikë |url=https://euronews.al/data-e-zgjedhjeve-begaj-proces-konsultash-dhe-llogaridhenie-per-aktoret-politike/ |access-date=29 November 2024 |archive-url=https://archive.today/20241129114114/https://euronews.al/data-e-zgjedhjeve-begaj-proces-konsultash-dhe-llogaridhenie-per-aktoret-politike/ |archive-date=29 November 2024 |language=sq |date=20 November 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref name="Maloku">{{cite web |last=Maloku |first=Danjela |work=Shqiptarja |title=Data për zgjedhjet 2025/ Pd refuzon ftesën e Presidentit: Konsultime farsë! Pl: S'pranojmë datën e caktuar nga Balla! Basha: Rëndësi ka standardi |url=https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/data-per-zgjedhjet-2025-begaj-vijon-takimet-me-partite-pret-tedi-blushin |access-date=29 November 2024 |archive-url=https://archive.today/20241129114852/https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/data-per-zgjedhjet-2025-begaj-vijon-takimet-me-partite-pret-tedi-blushin |archive-date=29 November 2024 |location=Tirana |language=sq |date=21 November 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref name="Maloku"/> Basha refrained from proposing a specific date but emphasised that the primary focus should be on election standards rather than the date itself.<ref name="Maloku"/> On 25 November, President Begaj concluded the consultation process and highlighted the importance of the process, stating that the discussions were guided by the best interests of the voters rather than narrow political calculations.<ref>{{cite web |last=Hoxhaj |first=Klevis |work=Albanian Post |title=Presidenti Begaj mbyll konsultimet për datën e zgjedhjeve |url=https://albanianpost.com/presidenti-begaj-mbyll-konsultimet-per-daten-e-zgjedhjeve/ |access-date=29 November 2024 |archive-url=https://archive.today/20241129115632/https://albanianpost.com/presidenti-begaj-mbyll-konsultimet-per-daten-e-zgjedhjeve/ |archive-date=29 November 2024 |language=sq |date=25 November 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref>{{cite web |work=Zëri |title=Data e zgjedhjeve/ Begaj rinis takimet, Pd bojkoton, Ps dhe Kqz në një linjë, duan votime më 11 maj |url=https://zeri.ai/politike-data-e-zgjedhjeve-begaj-rinis-takimet-pd-bojkoton-pret-ps-dhe-kryekomisionerin-celibashi-i215752 |access-date=29 November 2024 |archive-url=https://archive.today/20241129115627/https://zeri.ai/politike-data-e-zgjedhjeve-begaj-rinis-takimet-pd-bojkoton-pret-ps-dhe-kryekomisionerin-celibashi-i215752 |archive-date=29 November 2024 |location=Tirana |language=sq |date=25 November 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref>{{cite web |last=Delia-Kaci |first=Jetmira |title=Shqipëria do të mbajë zgjedhjet parlamentare më 11 maj |work=Radio Evropa e Lirë |url=https://www.evropaelire.org/a/shqiperi-shpallja-e-dates-se-zgjedhjeve-/33228202.html |access-date=7 December 2024 |archive-url=https://archive.today/20241207165752/https://www.evropaelire.org/a/shqiperi-shpallja-e-dates-se-zgjedhjeve-/33228202.html |archive-date=7 December 2024 |language=sq |date=5 December 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

sentences.text: On 26 July 2024, the parliament approved the amendments to the new electoral code, which included provisions for Albanian diaspora|diaspora Non-resident citizen voting|voting and the allocation of mandates. A significant focus centered on the formula employed for candidate lists, which was no longer entirely open; instead, one-third was designated as closed and subject to the discretion of the party leader, thereby exempting it from preferential voting. Furthermore, the new regulations stipulated that one out of every three candidates elected from the open list was required to be a woman, thereby reflecting a commitment to enhancing gender representation within the electoral framework.<ref name="Shqiptarja"/>

references.text: <ref name="Shqiptarja">{{cite web |work=Shqiptarja |title=106 vota pro, PS-PD miratojnë ndryshimet në Kodin Zgjedhor: Lista të hapura në 2/3 dhe votë të diasporës! 'Përplasen' demokratët, akuza për pazar Berisha-Rama |url=https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/kuvend-pakti-mes-pdps-sot-pritet-te-miratohet-kodi-i-ri-zgjedhor-ne-rend-dite-edhe-ligji-per-policine-e-shtetit-e-per-prodhimin-e-armeve |access-date=26 October 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240728050541/https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/kuvend-pakti-mes-pdps-sot-pritet-te-miratohet-kodi-i-ri-zgjedhor-ne-rend-dite-edhe-ligji-per-policine-e-shtetit-e-per-prodhimin-e-armeve |archive-date=28 July 2024 |language=sq |date=26 July 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

sentences.text: On 7 December 2024, the KQZ approved the allocation of electoral mandates and the creation of 93 electoral administration zones (ZAZ) for the 2025 elections. Municipalities with over 80,000 voters were divided into multiple ZAZs.

references.text: <ref name="Dec7Changes">{{cite web |publisher=KQZ |title=Zgjedhjet 2025–Krr miraton numrin e mandateve për çdo qark dhe ngritjen e zonave të administrimit zgjedhor |url=https://kqz.gov.al/2024/12/07/zgjedhjet-2025-krr-miraton-numrin-e-mandateve-per-cdo-qark-dhe-ngritjen-e-zonave-te-administrimit-zgjedhor/ |access-date=13 December 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20241213190401/https://kqz.gov.al/2024/12/07/zgjedhjet-2025-krr-miraton-numrin-e-mandateve-per-cdo-qark-dhe-ngritjen-e-zonave-te-administrimit-zgjedhor/ |archive-date=13 December 2024 |language=sq |date=7 December 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref name="Dec7Changes"/> The KQZ also finalized the mandate distribution, with Tirana set to elect 37 deputies, while Korça's representation will decrease to 10 due to the loss of one mandate.<ref name="Dec7Changes"/><ref>{{cite web |publisher=Televizioni Klan (TV Klan) |title=Zgjedhjet 2025: Tirana me 37 mandate, një mandat i hiqet Korçës |url=https://tvklan.al/zgjedhjet-2025-tirana-me-37-mandate-nje-mandat-i-hiqet-korces |access-date=13 December 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20241213190638/https://tvklan.al/zgjedhjet-2025-tirana-me-37-mandate-nje-mandat-i-hiqet-korces?__cf_chl_rt_tk=Y2q7jzp2VD_lAMox6XosXYFpZZYy_Iastk_DAMzpdZQ-1734116798-1.0.1.1-_XigeUx63xrAt3dRvFZzKyPMfuv5oBiSP3aWV33aUJ4 |archive-date=13 December 2024 |language=sq |date=13 December 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref>{{cite web |work=Zëri |title=Zbardhet relacioni i Kqz/ Tiranës i shtohet një mandat, Korça mbetet me një deputet më pak |url=https://zeri.ai/politike-zbardhet-relacioni-i-kqz-tiranes-i-shtohet-nje-mandat-korca-mbetet-me-nje-deputet-me-pak-i216425 |access-date=13 December 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20241213190828/https://zeri.ai/politike-zbardhet-relacioni-i-kqz-tiranes-i-shtohet-nje-mandat-korca-mbetet-me-nje-deputet-me-pak-i216425 |archive-date=13 December 2024 |location=Tirana |language=sq |date=6 December 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

sentences.text: In preparation for the 2025 elections, the KQZ introduced the PER application to facilitate the registration and voting of Albanian emigrants abroad. This initiative aims to ensure diaspora participation in the electoral process, with registration scheduled from 11 January to 11 March.<ref name="Konomi"/> To register, emigrants must provide a valid passport and a document verifying their residential address.<ref name="Konomi"/> The PER app, available for download on both mobile devices and computers, will serve as the sole method for voting from abroad.<ref name="Konomi"/> Once registered, emigrants will be removed from the domestic voter list, and by 11 May, a separate list of overseas voters will be finalised.<ref name="Konomi"/>

references.text: <ref name="Konomi">{{cite web |last=Konomi |first=Esiona |work=Shqiptarja |title=Vota e diasporës në zgjedhjet 2025, regjistrimi nga 11 janari–11 mars! Aplikacioni i Kqz drejt përfundimit, ja dokumentet që duhen! Kujdes adresën |url=https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/zgjedhjet-2025-regjistrimi-per-voten-e-diaspores-nga-11-janari-deri-me-11-mars-aplikacioni-drejt-perfundimit-ja-dokumentet-qe-duhen-kujdes-adresen |access-date=13 December 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20241213185714/https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/zgjedhjet-2025-regjistrimi-per-voten-e-diaspores-nga-11-janari-deri-me-11-mars-aplikacioni-drejt-perfundimit-ja-dokumentet-qe-duhen-kujdes-adresen |archive-date=13 December 2024 |language=sq |date=9 December 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

sentences.text: As of the electoral code, a parliamentary party is defined as a political organisation that has achieved representation in the parliament by obtaining a minimum of one seat in the most recent electoral contest.{{sfn|Electoral Code|2024|p=2}} Subsequent to the 2021 Albanian parliamentary election|2021 parliamentary election, the PS obtained 74 of the 140 seats, emerging as the majority party. The PD–AN secured 59 seats, while LSI acquired 4 seats and the PSD attained 3 seats.<ref name="CSIS"/>

references.text: <ref name="CSIS"/><ref>{{cite web |publisher=Parliament of Albania |title=Mandatet Parlamentare 2021–2025 |url=https://kuvendiwebfiles.blob.core.windows.net/webfiles/mandatet.pdf |access-date=20 December 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240711072337/https://kuvendiwebfiles.blob.core.windows.net/webfiles/mandatet.pdf |archive-date=11 July 2024 |location=Tirana |language=sq |url-status=live}}</ref>

references.text: <ref name="CSIS">{{cite web |publisher=Center for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS) |title=Albania: Parliamentary Elections April 25, 2021 |url=https://www.csis.org/programs/europe-russia-and-eurasia-program/projects/european-election-watch/2021-elections/albania |access-date=28 October 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240722073925/https://www.csis.org/programs/europe-russia-and-eurasia-program/projects/european-election-watch/2021-elections/albania |archive-date=22 July 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

sentences.text: In June 2024, Lulzim Basha, the former leader of the Democratic Party of Albania|Democratic Party, established a new faction titled, the Democratic Party–Euroatlantic Democrats, following internal conflicts regarding the ownership of the party's official seal. By November 2024, Basha revealed that he was engaged in advanced discussions with Endri Shabani of {{lang|sq|Nisma Thurje|i=no}} to explore potential electoral cooperation. However, Shabani publicly rejected the possibility of such an alliance, asserting that a cooperation with Basha or his faction was "zero".

references.text: <ref>{{cite web |publisher=Euronews Albania |title=Basha prezanton ndryshimet në logon e Pd: Demokratët euroatlantikë |url=https://euronews.al/basha-prezanton-ndryshimet-ne-logon-e-pd-demokratet-euroatlantike/ |access-date=15 November 2024 |archive-url=https://archive.today/20241115105612/https://euronews.al/basha-prezanton-ndryshimet-ne-logon-e-pd-demokratet-euroatlantike/ |archive-date=15 November 2024 |language=sq |date=14 June 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref>{{cite web |work=Zëri |title=Vulën e mori Berisha, Basha prezanton ndryshimet në logon e Pd-së: Demokratët Euroatlantike! |url=https://zeri.ai/politike/vulen-e-mori-berisha-basha-paralajmeron-parti-te-re-do-bej-rekurs-hyjme-i203961 |access-date=15 November 2024 |archive-url=https://archive.today/20241115104801/https://zeri.ai/politike/vulen-e-mori-berisha-basha-paralajmeron-parti-te-re-do-bej-rekurs-hyjme-i203961 |archive-date=15 November 2024 |location=Tirana |language=sq |date=14 June 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref>{{cite web |work=Dosja |title='Ka individë që kanë dhënë kontribut në kohë të vështira!' Basha: Në diskutime me Nisma Thurje për të dalë bashkë në zgjedhje |url=https://dosja.al/politike/ka-individe-qe-kane-dhene-kontribut-ne-kohe-te-veshtira-basha-ne-diskut-i401867 |access-date=15 November 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20241109194559/https://dosja.al/politike/ka-individe-qe-kane-dhene-kontribut-ne-kohe-te-veshtira-basha-ne-diskut-i401867 |archive-date=9 November 2024 |location=Tirana |language=sq |date=9 November 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref>{{cite web |work=Dosja |title=Basha deklaroi se janë në diskutime për bashkëpunim në zgjedhjet e 2025, Endri Shabani e përgënjeshtron: Zero shanse! |url=https://dosja.al/politike/basha-deklaroi-se-jane-ne-diskutime-per-bashkepunim-ne-zgjedhjet-e-2025-i401868 |access-date=15 November 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20241109182903/https://dosja.al/politike/basha-deklaroi-se-jane-ne-diskutime-per-bashkepunim-ne-zgjedhjet-e-2025-i401868 |archive-date=9 November 2024 |location=Tirana |language=sq |date=9 November 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

sentences.text: On 24 September 2024, representatives of the Democratic Party initiated consultations with allies for the upcoming elections, with Ilir Meta of the Freedom Party of Albania|Freedom Party being the first to meet. Meta did not take a clear stance on whether to run on a joint electoral list or separately, but expressed a preference for using his own party's logo. Berisha underscored that Meta, who is according to him incarcerated without a clear charge, would be included in the electoral list if his party joined the coalition.<ref name="SBIMS"/>

references.text: <ref name="PDPLSHQ">{{cite web |last=Maloku |first=Danjela |work=Shqiptarja |title=Një listë në zgjedhje? Pd nis takimet me aleatët, i pari në radhë Meta! Kreu i Pl: Duam logon tonë, por do gjejmë format më efikase |url=https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/zgjedhjet-parlamentare-noka-takohet-me-meten-diskutojne-nese-kandidatet-e-pl-do-futen-ne-lista-te-perbashketa-me-pd |access-date=15 November 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240924102516/https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/zgjedhjet-parlamentare-noka-takohet-me-meten-diskutojne-nese-kandidatet-e-pl-do-futen-ne-lista-te-perbashketa-me-pd |archive-date=24 September 2024 |language=sq |date=24 September 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref name="PDPLSHQ"/> On 14 November 2024, the party's leader Sali Berisha, who was placed under house arrest since December 2023, addressed concerns about Meta's involvement in the electoral list for the elections, despite Meta's imprisonment in October 2024.<ref name="SBIMS">{{cite web |work=Syri |title=A do jetë Ilir Meta pjesë e listës?/ Berisha: I burgosur politik! Dumani, me dhunë i kërkoi Ismailit dëshmi kundër tij |url=https://www.syri.net/syri_kosova/shqiperi/564583/a-do-jete-ilir-meta-pjese-e-listes-ose-berisha-i-burgosur-politik-dumani-me-dhune-i-kerkoi-ismailit-deshmi-kunder-tij/ |access-date=15 November 2024 |archive-url=https://archive.today/20241115130335/https://www.syri.net/syri_kosova/shqiperi/564583/a-do-jete-ilir-meta-pjese-e-listes-ose-berisha-i-burgosur-politik-dumani-me-dhune-i-kerkoi-ismailit-deshmi-kunder-tij/ |archive-date=15 November 2024 |language=sq |date=14 November 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

sentences.text: The table below lists the parties which have registered in Central Election Commission (Albania)|CEC for the next election and have qualified for ballot access.

references.text: <ref>{{cite web |date=17 March 2025 |title=KSHZ miraton listat shumemërore për 3 subjekte zgjedhore dhe renditjen në Fletën e Votimit |url=https://kqz.gov.al/lajme/kshz-miraton-listat-shumemerore-per-3-subjekte-zgjedhore-dhe-renditjen-ne-fleten-e-votimit |url-status=live |access-date=17 March 2025 |language=sq}}</ref>

sentences.text: On 21 December 2024, Albanian Prime Minister Edi Rama announced that TikTok would be banned in Albania for at least one year, starting from the beginning of 2025. Rama cited the death of a teenager in a brawl linked to a conflict on TikTok and concerns over social media promoting youth violence. Alongside this ban, the Albanian government plans to initiate educational programs for students and parents.

references.text: <ref>{{Cite web |title=Albania to ban TikTok for a year, blaming it for promoting violence among children |url=https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-12-22/albania-bans-tiktok-for-one-year/104755308?future=true&}}</ref>

sentences.text: On 13 March 2025, the Electronic and Postal Communications Authority (AKEP) and the National Cybersecurity Authority (AKSK), per the decisions released by the Albanian government, instructed all internet service providers in Albania to block TikTok's IPs, DNS resolution, and Server Name Indications, as well as ByteDance's IP addresses.

references.text: <ref>{{Cite web |title=Zbulohet data, ja kur do të mbyllet rrjeti social ‘TikTok’ në Shqipëri! |url=https://www.panorama.com.al/qeveria-njoftoi-mbylljen-e-tiktok-zbulohet-data-ja-kur-nis-bllokimi-i-aksesit-ne-vendin-tone-per-platformen-e-rrjeteve-sociale/}}</ref>

sentences.text: Opposition leader Sali Berisha criticized the ban, arguing it would hinder their ability to run online campaigns ahead of the elections. Hundreds of Democrat protesters gathered in front of the Kryeministria building on 15 March 2025 to protest the ban. Arlind Qori, leader of Together Movement, considered the ban as an act of censorship.

references.text: <ref>{{Cite web |title=Albanian opposition protests TikTok ban alleging censorship ahead of election |url=https://apnews.com/article/albania-opposition-tiktok-ban-protest-election-db108a58f84307596e257e41567248e7#:~:text=Last%20week%2C%20the%20Albanian%20Cabinet,and%20bullying%2C%20especially%20among%20children.}}</ref>

<ref>{{Cite web |title=Rama mbyll Tiktok, SHPËRTHEN Arlind Qori: AKT CENSURE, dy muaj para ZGJEDHJEVE! |url=https://top-channel.tv/video/rama-mbyll-tiktok-shperthen-arlind-qori-akt-censure-dy-muaj-para-zgjedhjeve-breaking/}}</ref>

sentences.text: Prime Minister Edi Rama of the Socialist Party introduced the initiative "PS2030 për Shqipërinë 2030" during the party's assembly on 8 September 2024. This initiative is centered on increasing youth engagement and preparing the party for Albania's future as a member of the European Union. Its key objectives include empowering younger members and adapting the party's structure and policies to meet the challenges of the upcoming decade.

references.text: <ref name="APSSHQ">{{cite web |work=Shqiptarja |title=Asambleja e Ps/ Rama: Unë dhe deputetët e vjetër garojmë në lista të hapura! Pd merr më pak mandate se në '97! Ndryshon drejtuesit politikë në 7 qarqe! Zgjidhet kryesia e re! |url=https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/ps-mbledh-sot-asamblene-kombetare-ne-durres-do-votohet-kryesia-e-re-dhe-sekretariati-nis-me-fjalimin-e-rames-axhenda |access-date=15 November 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240908104326/https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/ps-mbledh-sot-asamblene-kombetare-ne-durres-do-votohet-kryesia-e-re-dhe-sekretariati-nis-me-fjalimin-e-rames-axhenda |archive-date=8 September 2024 |location=Durrës |language=sq |date=8 September 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref name="APSSHQ"/><ref>{{cite web |work=Shqiptarja |title=Asambleja e Ps/ Rama: Skuadër e re për zgjedhjet 2025, e nxorëm Shqipërinë nga gropa e 11 viteve më parë |url=https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/asambleja-e-ps-rama-skuader-e-re-per-zgjedhjet-2025-e-nxorem-shqiperine-nga-gropa-e-11-viteve-me-pare |access-date=15 November 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240908121059/https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/asambleja-e-ps-rama-skuader-e-re-per-zgjedhjet-2025-e-nxorem-shqiperine-nga-gropa-e-11-viteve-me-pare |archive-date=8 September 2024 |language=sq |date=8 September 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref name="APSSHQ"/> As part of its election preparations, the party launched the platform called "Deputeti që Duam" focusing on selecting candidates from four key categories, including the diaspora, youth, women, and professionals.<ref>{{cite web |publisher=A2 CNN |title='Deputeti që duam', Rama: Platformë për ata që ndryshe nuk iu vjen radha |url=https://a2news.com/shqiperia/politike/deputeti-qe-duam-rama-platforme-per-ata-qe-ndryshe-nuk-iu-vje-i1127811 |access-date=15 November 2024 |archive-url=https://archive.today/20241115123100/https://a2news.com/shqiperia/politike/deputeti-qe-duam-rama-platforme-per-ata-qe-ndryshe-nuk-iu-vje-i1127811 |archive-date=15 November 2024 |language=sq |date=9 September 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref>{{cite web |work=Shqiptarja |title=Përgatitjet për mbledhjen e parë të Kryesisë së re/ Në Ps bëhet gati banderola 'Deputeti që duam': Fokusi tek, diaspora, rinia, gratë dhe profesionistët |url=https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/pergatitjet-per-mbledhjen-e-pare-te-kryesise-se-re-ne-ps-behet-gati-banderola-deputeti-qe-duam-fokusi-tek-diaspora-rinia-grate-dhe-profesionistet |access-date=15 November 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240909145143/https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/pergatitjet-per-mbledhjen-e-pare-te-kryesise-se-re-ne-ps-behet-gati-banderola-deputeti-qe-duam-fokusi-tek-diaspora-rinia-grate-dhe-profesionistet |archive-date=9 September 2024 |language=sq |date=9 September 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref>{{cite web |work=Shqiptarja |title='Deputeti që duam', Rama: Kush ka ambicie të aplikojë! Kushtet nuk janë që të kesh 'mik' apo të dish të flasësh bukur |url=https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/deputeti-qe-duam-rama-kush-ka-ambicie-te-aplikoje-kushtet-nuk-jane-qe-te-kesh-mik-apo-te-dish-te-flasesh-bukur |access-date=15 November 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240909180336/https://shqiptarja.com/lajm/deputeti-qe-duam-rama-kush-ka-ambicie-te-aplikoje-kushtet-nuk-jane-qe-te-kesh-mik-apo-te-dish-te-flasesh-bukur |archive-date=9 September 2024 |language=sq |date=9 September 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

sentences.text: In August 2024, Basha of the Democratic Party–Euroatlantic Democrats presented an anti-corruption strategy for the elections, including the formation of a dedicated unit to trace and recover misappropriated public funds, alongside reinforcing the roles of the Special Structure against Corruption and Organized Crime (SPAK) and the Special First Instance Court for Corruption and Organized Crime (GJKKO). Basha further advocates for an extension of an anti-mafia law to encompass corrupt public-private partnerships, the confiscation of illicit assets from public officials, and the removal of parliamentary immunity to facilitate comprehensive investigations.<ref name="LBBS"/> Additionally, he proposes a vetting process aimed at cleansing both central and local government institutions.<ref name="LBBS"/>

references.text: <ref name="LBBS">{{cite web |work=Bota Sot |title=Basha publikon programin për zgjedhjet 2025, premton 'luftë të egër' ndaj korrupsionit |url=https://www.botasot.info/shqiperia/2219680/basha-publikon-programin-per-zgjedhjet-2025-premton-lufte-te-eger-ndaj-korrupsionit/ |access-date=15 November 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240828025404/https://www.botasot.info/shqiperia/2219680/basha-publikon-programin-per-zgjedhjet-2025-premton-lufte-te-eger-ndaj-korrupsionit/ |archive-date=28 August 2024 |language=sq |date=23 August 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

sentences.text: In September 2024, the Democratic Party appointed Flamur Noka to lead the party's the coordination of campaign activities for the elections. Also in September, Adriatik Lapaj of Lëvizja Shqipëria Bëhet stated that over the past year, they have been actively engaging citizens through meetings in Tirana, regional areas, and the diaspora, underscoring the role of the electorate in challenging the existing government. Lapaj criticized both the Socialist Party and Democratic Party, claiming that their leaders exploit criminal networks to manipulate elections and maintain power.<ref name="ALBW"/> Lapaj's vision seeks to dismantle this system, promising an alternative model based on honesty and accountability, with the ultimate goal of empowering the Albanian people to enact change.<ref name="ALBW"/>

references.text: <ref>{{cite web |last=Barjamemaj |first=Anesti |publisher=A2 CNN |title=Zgjedhjet 2025, zbulohet kush do drejtojë fushatën e Pd |url=https://a2news.com/shqiperia/politike/zgjedhjet-2025-zbulohet-kush-do-drejtoje-fushaten-e-pd-i1127497 |access-date=15 November 2024 |archive-url=https://archive.today/20241115115656/https://a2news.com/shqiperia/politike/zgjedhjet-2025-zbulohet-kush-do-drejtoje-fushaten-e-pd-i1127497 |archive-date=15 November 2024 |language=sq |date=4 September 2024 |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref name="ALBW">{{cite web |work=BalkanWeb |title=Zgjedhjet e 2025/ Lapaj: Do të kemi rezultat surprizë. Fitorja më e madhe e shqiptarëve do të ishte |url=https://www.balkanweb.com/zgjedhjet-e-2025-lapaj-do-te-kemi-rezultat-surprize-fitorja-me-e-madhe-e-shqiptareve-do-te-ishte/#gsc.tab=0 |access-date=14 November 2024 |archive-url= |archive-date= |language=sq |date=10 September 2024 }}</ref>

sentences.text: The Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe will deploy 338 officials led by Lamberto Zannier to monitor the election.

references.text: <ref>{{cite web |publisher=Associated Press |title=OSCE observers launch mission to monitor Albania’s upcoming parliamentary vote |url=https://apnews.com/article/albania-parliamentary-election-politics-69ca955143d989c3fe138df63f28acac |access-date=3 April 2025 |date=3 April 2025}}</ref>
